title: Backend: Implement Core Jint Transformation Engine
description: Implement the core transformation service using the Jint library. This includes creating the engine, passing a JsonNode from .NET to JS, executing a script, and returning the modified JsonNode back to .NET.
sprint_goal: Establish the secure, sandboxed transformation engine and the complete backend API for managing versioned scripts.
acceptance_criteria: ['The engine correctly executes a valid ES6 script.', 'The engine can be instantiated and invoked from .NET.', 'Correctly passes JSON from .NET to JS and returns it.']
definition_of_done: Code implemented and peer-reviewed. Unit tests pass with >80% coverage. Integration with Report Execution Service is stubbed.
deployment_notes: Core service for all other DTR features.
business_value: Enables the foundational data manipulation capability of the product.

title: Backend: Implement Secure Jint Sandbox Constraints
description: Configure the Jint engine to run within a secure sandbox with configurable constraints for execution timeout, memory allocation, statement count, and disabled CLR access.
sprint_goal: Establish the secure, sandboxed transformation engine and the complete backend API for managing versioned scripts.
acceptance_criteria: ['Scripts attempting to exceed timeout, memory, or statement limits are terminated.', 'Scripts attempting CLR access throw a security exception.', 'Constraint values are configurable.']
definition_of_done: Code implemented and passes security review. Unit tests for each violation (timeout, memory, etc.) are implemented and passing.
testing_requirements: Unit tests simulating each constraint violation.
deployment_notes: Critical for system stability and security.
business_value: Protects the system from malicious or buggy user-provided scripts.

title: Backend: Implement Script CRUD API with Versioning
description: Create the database schema and RESTful API endpoints for full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) functionality for transformation scripts. Every update must create a new version.
sprint_goal: Establish the secure, sandboxed transformation engine and the complete backend API for managing versioned scripts.
acceptance_criteria: ['Admin can create, view, modify, and delete scripts via API.', 'Saving an existing script creates a new version.', 'API is secured via RBAC for Administrators only.']
definition_of_done: EF Core migrations created and tested. API endpoints implemented and documented in Swagger. Integration tests for CRUD and versioning pass.
testing_requirements: Integration tests for all API endpoints and versioning logic.
deployment_notes: API foundation for the script management UI.
business_value: Enables the management and reuse of transformation logic with full auditability.

title: Frontend: Integrate Monaco Editor for Script Editing
description: Create the UI for creating and editing transformation scripts. Integrate the Monaco Editor component to provide a rich editing experience with JavaScript syntax highlighting and real-time validation.
sprint_goal: Build the user interface for managing scripts and the backend for script previews.
acceptance_criteria: ['Script management page displays Monaco Editor.', 'Syntax is highlighted correctly.', 'Code completion suggestions are triggered.', 'Visual indicator appears under syntax errors.']
definition_of_done: Monaco Editor integrated and configured. Component connects to the backend API for saving scripts. Component tests and E2E stubs are complete.
deployment_notes: Provides the primary user interface for script creation.
business_value: Improves administrator productivity and reduces errors in script development.

title: Backend: Implement Preview API Endpoint with Timeout
description: Implement the `POST /api/v1/transformations/preview` endpoint. It must handle both sample JSON data and live data from a connector, and enforce a configurable 30-second server-side timeout using a CancellationToken.
sprint_goal: Build the user interface for managing scripts and the backend for script previews.
acceptance_criteria: ['API returns 200 OK with transformed data on success.', 'API returns 400 for syntax errors.', 'API returns 408 if execution exceeds timeout.', 'API correctly processes both `sampleData` and `connectorId` requests.']
definition_of_done: API endpoint implemented and documented in Swagger. Integration tests cover all scenarios (sample, live, error, timeout).
deployment_notes: Powers the interactive script preview feature.
business_value: Enables rapid testing and debugging of transformation scripts.

title: Backend: Implement Structured Script Error Handling
description: Enhance the Jint engine wrapper to catch JavaScript exceptions and return a structured error object in the API response, including message, stack trace, and line number.
sprint_goal: Build the user interface for managing scripts and the backend for script previews.
acceptance_criteria: ['When a script throws an exception, the engine catches it.', 'A detailed error is logged on the backend.', 'The API response contains a JSON object `{"error": {"message": "...", "stackTrace": "...", "lineNumber": ...}}`.']
definition_of_done: Jint wrapper updated to catch and parse exceptions. Custom exception types created. Integration tests verify the structured error response.
testing_requirements: Unit tests that throw various JS exceptions.
deployment_notes: Improves debuggability of scripts for users.
business_value: Provides clear, actionable feedback to administrators when their scripts fail.

title: Frontend: Implement 3-Pane Preview UI
description: Implement the 3-pane resizable layout for the script editor, sample JSON input, and transformed output/error view. Connect the UI to the preview API.
sprint_goal: Complete the interactive developer experience by integrating the preview functionality and adding version history management to the UI.
acceptance_criteria: ['UI displays three distinct, resizable panes.', 'Output pane shows formatted JSON on success.', 'Output pane shows structured error on failure.']
definition_of_done: React component for the 3-pane layout is complete. State management for API calls (loading, success, error) is implemented. E2E tests for the preview workflow pass.
testing_requirements: E2E testing of the full preview workflow.
deployment_notes: Central part of the script development user experience.
business_value: Provides a powerful REPL-like experience for script development.

title: Frontend: Implement Version History & Visual Diff UI
description: Create the UI for viewing script version history. Implement a modal to display a list of versions and integrate a diff viewer component to show a side-by-side comparison of two selected versions.
sprint_goal: Complete the interactive developer experience by integrating the preview functionality and adding version history management to the UI.
acceptance_criteria: ['UI shows a list of historical versions.', 'UI allows selecting two versions and displays a visual diff.', 'UI provides a 'revert' function that calls the backend.']
definition_of_done: Version history modal is complete. Monaco Diff Editor or similar is integrated. Revert functionality is connected to the backend API.
testing_requirements: E2E tests for comparing and reverting versions.
deployment_notes: Completes the script management feature set.
business_value: Allows for easy auditing and rollback of script changes.

title: Frontend: Display Performance Warning in Report Config
description: In the Report Configuration UI, when a user selects a transformation script, display a persistent performance warning about potential increases in memory usage and processing time.
sprint_goal: Complete the interactive developer experience by integrating the preview functionality and adding version history management to the UI.
acceptance_criteria: ['When a script is selected in the report config UI, a warning message is displayed.', 'The warning mentions memory and processing time.', 'The warning remains visible as long as a script is associated.']
definition_of_done: React component for the report configuration is updated with conditional rendering for the warning.
business_value: Manages user expectations about the performance impact of transformations.

title: Backend: Implement Prometheus Metrics Endpoint
description: Integrate `prometheus-net` to expose key performance and health metrics for the transformation engine via a `/metrics` endpoint. Metrics include execution time, memory usage, and counters for executions/errors/timeouts.
sprint_goal: Finalize operational requirements, logging, monitoring, and documentation.
acceptance_criteria: ['`/metrics` endpoint returns Prometheus-compatible text format.', 'Endpoint exposes histogram for execution time.', 'Endpoint exposes counters for executions, timeouts, and errors.']
definition_of_done: prometheus-net integrated. Custom metrics defined. Jint engine instrumented to update metrics. Integration tests validate endpoint and metric updates.
business_value: Provides essential observability into a critical system component.

title: Backend: Implement Comprehensive Security Audit Logging
description: Implement logging for any sandbox constraint violations (timeout, memory, etc.) and all script CRUD operations to an immutable, compliance-ready audit trail.
sprint_goal: Finalize operational requirements, logging, monitoring, and documentation.
acceptance_criteria: ['Sandbox violations are logged to a security audit trail.', 'CRUD operations on scripts create an entry in the audit trail.', 'Log integrity mechanisms are in place for SOC 2 / ISO 27001 compliance.']
definition_of_done: Audit logging integrated into Jint wrapper and script management service. Audit log design reviewed against compliance objectives. Integration tests verify log creation for all events.
deployment_notes: Critical for enterprise security and compliance requirements.
business_value: Provides a tamper-evident record of all sensitive operations for security and compliance audits.

title: Documentation: Create User Guide and API Reference
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the Data Transformation feature, including a user guide for administrators, a technical API reference, and an OpenAPI 3.0 specification.
sprint_goal: Finalize operational requirements, logging, monitoring, and documentation.
acceptance_criteria: ['A user guide covering script management and testing exists.', 'A technical reference for custom sandbox functions is complete.', 'An accurate OpenAPI 3.0 spec is available.']
definition_of_done: All documentation artifacts are written, peer-reviewed for technical accuracy, and published.
deployment_notes: Essential for user adoption and integration.
business_value: Enables users and integrators to effectively use the new feature.
